title: Aadhya's Dainty Diamond-Studded Bangles
features: Sleek, modern bangle design featuring equidistant floral and geometrical motifs, each studded with sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones. The linear arrangement creates a contemporary aesthetic while maintaining a delicate balance. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the brilliant white sparkle of Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Can also be worn for simple functions and get-togethers.
description: Combines the timeless appeal of gold with a modern and lightweight design. The brilliant Cubic Zirconia stones offer a luxurious look without the hefty price tag. The durable Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and resistance to wear and tear.
